ResearchProjectDef.label: large cannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build manned large cannons that has a long range and a very high accuracy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 6Pdr Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 6 Pounder Cannon Turret based on A.E.C Deacon Turret . Capable of using AP shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 75mm Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 75mm Cannon based on 75mm Pak 40 Field Gun . Capable of using AP shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 88mm Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 88mm Cannon based on Flak 88 AA/Artillery Gun. Capable of using HE and AP shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: howitzers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large howitzers that launches massive high explosive shells over buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 15cm Howitzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: A 15cm howitzer based on sIG 33 Heavy Infantry Gun .

ResearchProjectDef.label: 9.7 Inch Howitzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: A big 9.7 Inch howitzer based on BL 9.2 Inch Howitzer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 60cm Howitzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: A massive 60cm howitzer based on "Karl Ger√§t" Railway gun.

ResearchProjectDef.label: large autocannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build manned large autocannons that has a long range and a very high accuracy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Single 20mm Autocannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 20mm autocannon based on 20mm Flak 38 AA gun. Uses a 20 round magazine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Single 37mm Autocannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 37mm autocannon based on 37mm Flak M42 AA gun. Uses a belt-feed system with maximum 300 rounds of ammunition.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Single 40mm Autocannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 40mm autocannon based on M1 Bofors AA gun. Needs a 4x40mm Ammo Clip and has a storage of about 20 clips.

ResearchProjectDef.label: naval guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large naval guns that are equipped with autoloading system and has armored casing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 127mm naval gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 127mm naval gun turret that shoots HE shells over long distances.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 100mm naval gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: A fast-firing manned single 100mm naval gun turret that uses a belt-feed ammo consists of 100 shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 120mm naval gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: A fast-firing manned single 120mm naval gun turret that uses a belt-feed ammo consists of 52 shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: naval guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large caliber armored heavy naval guns that can shoot over walls with relatively high fire rate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 150mm naval gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single mounted 15cm naval gun turret that can shoot over walls, has a relatively high fire rate and very durable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Twin 127mm naval gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned dual mounted 127mm naval gun turret that can shoot over walls, has a relatively high fire rate and very durable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned large cannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to research and build the unmanned variant of large cannons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned 6Pdr Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: An unmanned version of 6 Pounder Cannon Turret based on A.E.C Deacon Turret. Capable of using AP shells.
